AAk.caption: Path Filter
AAk.doc: A JSON path filter to extract serialized JSON from the serialized JSON, see https://github.com/dchester/jsonpath for more details.
AAk.name: pathfilter

AAl.caption: Source JSON
AAl.doc: The source serialized JSON to filter.
AAl.name: sourcejson

ABa.caption: Filter serialized JSON using a JSON path query string. Returns the serialized extracted JSON. See https://github.com/dchester/jsonpath for more details.
ABa.name: information
